caption.title: Relative standard error (RSE) of incidence estimate against ODn threshold in three demonstrative surveillance scenarios (assuming imperfect ARV exposure testing).
caption.p: A: Scenario similar to South African epidemic. B: Scenario similar to Kenyan epidemic. C: Concentrated epidemic scenario. Assuming imperfect ARV exposure testing which reduces the FRR in virally unsuppressed treated individuals to 10% of FRR in suppressed individuals when no viral load threshold applied.
Click here for additional data file.
